name: Motorbike Freestyle 2
description:
Motorbike Freestyle 2 is a real physics motorbike trial game.

Test your freestyle skills now.

FEATURES

* Day and Night Level
* 12 Different Bike
* Huge Ramps and Hills
* Realistic Driving Experience and Feelings
* Realistic Physics
* Beautiful Arena
* Realistic Sounds

Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

DOWNLOAD AND DO TRICKS NOW!
